features: EXFOLIATING ACNE FACE WASH: This non-medicated facial wash helps clear dirt and debris from deep within the pores. Tiny exfoliating beads gently resurface the skin.
GENTLE FORMULA: Your daily face wash should work with your acne treatment. This non-medicated formula resurfaces the skin for a smoother, softer-looking complexion without irritation.
SAFE FOR ALL AGES AND SKIN TYPES: Proactiv's Deep Cleansing Face Wash provides the same powerful skin care for teens and adults, and is great for sensitive and irritated skin.
HOW IT WORKS: Gentle exfoliating beads help slough away dull, dry layers of dead skin cells, helping to clear pores and prep them for treatment. Non-medicated specifically for sensitive skin.
FROM THE COMPANY THAT STARTED A SKINCARE REVOLUTION: Designed specifically for acne-prone sensitive skin, ProactivMD Deep Cleansing Face Wash is the first step to having radiant skin.
body.description: A gentle liquid cleanser Formulated to help clear dirt and debris from deep within the pores. Tiny exfoliating beads to help gently resurface the skin for a smoother, softer-looking complexion. Includes pore resurface: gentle exfoliating beads help slough away dull, dry layers of dead skin cells, helping to clear pores.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars nice quality product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best face wash
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using proactiv for many years now. I had a lot of hormonal acne growing up and proactiv always seemed to help. I mainly just use the face wash now alongside Cetaphil for removing makeup and a face moisturizer / serum. This face wash has super fine exfoliating beads that don’t scratch or harm your skin while seemingly removing some dry / dead skin. Your face 100% feels refreshed and clean after using this. I use it maybe 3-4 times a week, mainly on the days I wear makeup. Although I wish the price was a little better I do highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A little pricey for the amount you get but works well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best skin ever
reviews.reviewText: This is the best wash I have ever had it makes my skin look so smooth and soft!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this product for a few months now, and I've been very satisfied with the results. I have problems with hormonal acne, even cystic, and this cleanser helps control the breakouts. It deep cleans and my face always feels fresh after I wash it. With using this, the breakouts are not as bad as they used to be and they don't even last but a few days. I would definitely say that if you want a preventative cleanser, I wouldn't hold my breath, but it does help control the breakouts, and they aren't as bad, at least not with me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: After trying multiple different washes, for years, this works! You have to make sure you use it as directed (twice daily)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product but not for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: Am giving this product a good review just because I know it's a great product and I've seen it work well for other people. But if you have super-sensitive skin like I do well this is not the product for you. Simply because after 2 and a half days of use my face and chin broke out in hives and I was itching like crazy. I had to stop using it and until now the itching is less but the rash haven't cleared. As I said great product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seems to work.
reviews.reviewText: My sensitive skin looks good so I guess it's working!
